\beginhymn Tantum ergo Sacramentum.


\setgregorian1
\setclef14
\musicindent14mm
\raisesong3\Internote
\nosolesmescustos
\initiumgregorianum
%%%Tantum ergo Sacramentum
\musicinitial{3.}{T}%
\sgn {}An\punctum L\egn
\sgn tum\punctum L\egn
\spatium
\sgn {}er\punctum M\egn
\sgn go{}\engl{\idx{Down in adoration falling}}\clivis LK\egn
\spatium
\sgn Sac\punctum N\egn
\sgn ram\punctum N\egn
\sgn {}{\'e}n\pes ac\egn
\sgn tum\punctum c\augmentum d\egn
\spatium
\divisiominima
\spatium
%%%Veneremur cernui
\sgn V{e}n\pes cd\egn
\sgn {}er\punctum c\egn
\sgn {}{\'e}m\punctum c\egn
\sgn {}ur\engl{this great Sacrament we hail;}\punctum b\egn
\spatium
\sgn c{\'e}r\punctum a\egn
\sgn nu{-}\punctum c\egn
\sgn {}i{:}\climacus baN\augmentum N\egn
\spatium
\divisiominor
\custos N
\lineaproxima
\spatium
%%%Et antiquum documentum,
\sgn {}Et\punctum N\egn
\spatium
%\custos a
%\lineaproxima
\sgn {}an\punctum a\egn
\sgn t{\'\i}q\punctum c\egn
\sgn {u}um\engl{Ancient types have long departed,}\punctum b\egn
\spatium
\sgn doc\punctum a\egn
\sgn {}um\punctum N\egn
\sgn {}{\'e}n\punctum a\egn
\sgn tum\punctum N\augmentum N\egn
\spatium
\divisiominima
\spatium
%%%Novo cedat ritui
\sgn N{o}v\punctum a\egn
\sgn {}o{}\punctum b\egn
\spatium
%\custos N\lineaproxima
\sgn c{e}d\punctum N\egn
\sgn {}at\engl{newer rites of grace prevail}\punctum N\egn
\spatium
\sgn r{\'\i}{-}\punctum L\egn
\sgn tu{-}\punctum a\egn
\sgn {}i{:}\clivis aK\augmentumduplex bL\egn
\spatium
\divisiominor
\spatium
%%%Praestet fides supplementum
\sgn {Pr}{\ae}s\punctum L\egn
\sgn tet\engl{Faith for}\punctum N\egn
\spatium
\custos N
\lineaproxima
\sgn f{i}d\punctum N\egn
\sgn {}es\punctum L\egn
\spatium
%\custos N
%\lineaproxima
\sgn sup\punctum N\egn
\sgn {pl}em\engl{all defects supplying, }\punctum a\egn
\sgn {}{\'e}n\punctum a\egn
\sgn tum\punctum N\augmentum N\egn
\spatium
\divisiominima
\spatium
%%%Sensuum defectui
\sgn S{\'e}n\punctum a\egn
\sgn su{-}\punctum b\egn
\sgn {}um\punctum N\egn
\spatium
\sgn de{--}\engl{where the feeble senses fail.}\clivis aN\egn
\sgn f{\'e}{ct}\clivis ML\egn
\sgn {}u{--}\punctum K\egn
\sgn {}i{.}\punctum L\augmentum L\egn
\spatium
\divisiofinalis
\spatium
%%%Genitori Genitoque
\sgn Gen\punctum L\egn
\sgn {}i{-}\punctum L\egn
\sgn t{\'o}r\engl{Glory let us }\punctum M\egn
\sgn {}i,\clivis LK\egn
\spatium
\custos N
\lineaproxima
\sgn Gen\punctum N\egn
\sgn {}i{-}\engl{give and blessing }\punctum N\egn
\sgn t{\'o}q\pes ac\egn
\sgn ue{}\punctum c\augmentum d\egn
\spatium
\divisiominima
\spatium
%\custos c
%\lineaproxima
%%%Laus et jubilatio
\sgn L{au}s\pes cd\egn
\spatium
\sgn {}et\punctum c\egn
\spatium
\sgn jub\engl{to the Father and the Son.}\punctum c\egn
\sgn {}i{-}\punctum b\egn
\sgn l{\'a}{-}\punctum a\egn
\sgn ti{-}\punctum c\egn
\sgn {}o{,}\climacus baN\augmentum N\egn
\spatium
\divisiominor
\spatium
%%%Salus honor virtus quoque
\sgn S{a}{-}\punctum N\egn
\sgn lu{s,}\punctum a\egn
\spatium
\sgn h{o}n\punctum c\egn
\sgn {}o{r,}\engl{Honour, might and praise ad-}\punctum b\egn
\spatium
\sgn v{i}r\punctum a\egn
\sgn tus\punctum N\egn
\spatium
\custos a
\lineaproxima
\sgn {qu}oq\engl{dressing,}\punctum a\egn
\sgn ue{}\punctum N\augmentum N\egn
\spatium
\divisiominima
\spatium
%%%Sit et benedictio
\sgn Sit\punctum a\egn
\spatium
\sgn {}et\punctum b\egn
\spatium
%\custos N
%\lineaproxima
\sgn ben\engl{while eternal ages run.}\punctum N\egn
\sgn {}ed\punctum N\egn
\sgn {}{\'\i}c\punctum L\egn
\sgn ti{-}\punctum a\egn
\sgn {}o{:}\clivis aK\augmentumduplex bL\egn
\spatium
\divisiominor
\spatium
%\custos L\lineaproxima
%%%Procedenti ab utroque
\sgn {Pr}{o}c\punctum L\egn
\sgn {}ed\punctum N\egn
\sgn {}{\'e}n\punctum N\egn
\sgn ti{}\punctum L\egn
\spatium
\sgn {}ab\engl{Equal praise to Him confessing,}\punctum N\egn
\spatium
\sgn {}ut\punctum a\egn
\sgn r{\'o}q\punctum a\egn
\sgn ue{}\punctum N\augmentum N\egn
\spatium
\divisiominima
\spatium
\custos a
\lineaproxima
%%%Compar sit laudatio
\sgn C{o}m\punctum a\egn
\sgn par\punctum b\egn
\spatium
\sgn sit\engl{who proceeds from both as one.}\punctum N\egn
\spatium
\sgn lau\clivis aN\egn
\sgn d{\'a}{-}\clivis ML\egn
\sgn ti{-}\punctum K\egn
%\custos L
%\lineaproxima
\sgn {}o{.}\punctum L\augmentum L\egn
\spatium
\divisiofinalis
\spatium
%%%Amen
\spatium
\sgn {}Am\torculus LML\egn
\sgn {}e{n.}\pes KL\augmentumduplex LJ\egn
\spatium
\Finisgregoriana



\bigskip


\goodbreak
\medskip

\s V. Panem de c\ae lo pr\ae stit\'\i sti eis. (P.~T.~allel\'uia.)

{\hskip35mm \it Thou hast given them bread from heaven.}

\smallskip

\s R. Omne delectam\'entum in se hab\'entem. (P.~T.~allel\'uia.)

{\hskip35mm \it Having in itself all delight.}

\goodbreak
\filbreak
\bigskip

\moveleft5mm\hbox{

\vtop{

\hsize47mm

\noindent Oremus,

\textinitial{D}{eus}, qui nobis sub Sacra\-m\'ento mir\'abili passi\'onis
tu\ae\ mem\'oriam reliqu\'\i sti : tr\'\i bue, qu\'\ae sumus, ita nos c\'orporis 
et s\'anguinis tui sacra myst\'eria vener\'ari; ut redempti\'onis tu\ae\
fructum in nobis j\'ugiter sen\-ti\'a\-mus.  Qui vivis et regnas in 
s\'\ae \-cula s\ae cul\'orum. \s R. Amen.

}

\hskip5mm

\vtop{

\hsize54mm

%\s V. You have given them bread from heaven, alleluia.

%\s R. Having in itself all delight, alleluia.

%\bigskip

\noindent Let us pray,

%\centerline{Let us pray,}
\it O God, who, under a wonderful Sacrament, hast left us
a memorial of Thy Passion: grant us, we beseech Thee, so to 
venerate the sacred mysteries of Thy Body and Blood that we may
ever feel within ourselves the fruit of Thy Redemption. 
Who livest and reignest forever and ever. \s R. Amen.

}

}

%{\hskip70mm \s R. Amen.}
